JobFullDesc:
About the role: 
Working directly with the country’s largest beverage alcohol distributors, SevenFifty’s Implementation Specialists help our customers embrace innovation and digital transformation by utilizing our comprehensive database of wines, beers, and spirits and making it accessible through an industry-standard online marketplace. 
What this looks like:
Our Implementation team is a fully remote, tight-knit, and creative group made up of Implementation Specialists and Technical Account Managers. We value taking ownership, achieving difficult goals, and changing the industry for the better. 
If you love technology, the beverage industry, and lots of autonomy, this role is for you. Past Implementation Specialists have gone on to roles in Operations, Leadership, Post-Launch Account Management, and Product Management.  This is a fully remote position reporting to the Director of Client Implementations, Kimberly Chabot. What you’ll do:
1. Work with our customers to define project objectives, implementation schedules, and deliverables.2. Serve as the customer's main technical point of contact prior to and immediately after launch.3. Work closely with our Customer Success, Data, Engineering, Sales, and Technical Account Management teams.4. Manage a variety of implementation projects and technical integrations simultaneously including but not limited to writing detailed technical specifications, coordinating with developers and stakeholders on timeline and rollout, ensuring seamless handoffs between teams, documenting workflows and processes, and measuring impact.5. Thrive in a fast-paced, low structure, ever-changing environment where you have ownership over your domain and your relationships.6. Learn the ins-and-outs of the beverage alcohol industry, including state-by-state regulations.What you'll have:

Past experience as an Implementation Manager, Integration Specialist, Technical Account Manager, etc. at a SaaS company.
Experience with technical project management and tools such as Jira, Asana, HubSpot, and Zendesk.
An analytical mind and a passion for problem-solving.
Excellent organizational skills, verbal and written communication skills, and acute attention to detail.
An aptitude for explaining technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Ability to triage and troubleshoot issues independently and efficiently.
A strong mastery of Excel and familiarity with databases and their structures.
Experience in the hospitality and/or alcohol beverage space a plus.

Perks & Benefits:

100% paid individual medical, dental, and vision via Justworks and Aetna.
Meaningful equity in an industry-changing organization.
Unlimited vacation to rest and recover.
3-months of family leave to care for your child (after your first year of employment).
Flexibility to work where you want so long as you're meeting your team and customer's goals.
Learning opportunities such as a professional certification from WSET (Wine & Spirit Education Trust).

Our Values:
1. Light the way: Inspire others with your vision for success.2. Open the door: Ask, listen, and empower others.3. Stir it up: Embrace experimentation and bring new ideas to life.4. Keep the glass full: Do more than is expected, for yourself and for others.5. Respect the craft: Commit to excellence and integrity in your work.
We are an equal opportunity employer. What does that mean at SevenFifty? We:

Give each team member an equal opportunity to develop and grow into a leadership role.
Acknowledge our shortcomings and try to do improve our company and our industry.
Elevate BIPOC voices in our industry publication, SevenFifty Daily. 
Do not discriminate against candidates or employees on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, marital status, veteran status, disability status, or socioeconomic status. 
Have regular, sometimes awkward, conversations about diversity, equity, and inclusion in our employee resource group, SevenFifty Community.
Are honest and recognize that our company isn’t as diverse as it should be. We’re trying to change that.
